name: 女神驾到(Happy together)
description: "Happy together" is a live action real-actress-recorded dating game. In the game, players will develop romantic stories with multiple female characters. You get to decide with whom to enter into a relationship in the end. It is a must-have training program for dating and picking up girls in real life. Game features: 1.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP SP1 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
